Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
The main server-side class for handling the client connection After initializing the connection, this handler will continously listen for new messages from the client, which will then dispatch to one of the command handlers
If necessary, it also sends messages to the other users related to this client via the other users' client handlers

    sendAsynchronousCommands()
    Each handler will see if it's appropriate to send the respective command, based on what happened in the sync commands before This method is called only after a synchronous command has been handled, which is correct as the server can't send messages of its own volition
    private void
    tryAsyncCommandsForAll()
    Requests all handlers for all clients in this user's lobby (if there are any) to try and send asynchronous commands relative to the current game state

      private void tryAsyncCommandsForAll()

    • forwardRequest

      private void forwardRequest()
      This method copies the request and puts it back in the answer
      This is used to make the client's receiver know what kind of message was sent and what action has been performed

    • connectionLostAlert

      public void connectionLostAlert(String error)
      Handle the exceptions thrown by losing connection. This method is called by any class that has a way of intercepting a connection loss Sets error state in order to show the error to the other players in future view. It signals a problem and if necessary brings the server back to a consistent state Closes connection.

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection()
      Closes the current connection's sockets Sets isConnected to false.

    • handleCommand

      public void handleCommand(MessageBroker messageBroker)
      Finds the command that's been given and runs the appropriate methods
      Parameters:
      messageBroker - The broker containing the message with the command to handle

    • sendAsynchronousCommands

      public void sendAsynchronousCommands()
      Each handler will see if it's appropriate to send the respective command, based on what happened in the sync commands before This method is called only after a synchronous command has been handled, which is correct as the server can't send messages of its own volition

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()

      public Socket getMainSocket()
      Used by the Server class to coordinate opening the ping socket
